message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 60, you take 40.  We can adjust if you think that's unfair.
Your offer was a bit skewed in your favor, Alice. How about we flip it around?  This way we avoid further devaluation.
Okay, let's try to find a middle ground.  I'll take 55 this time, and you can have 45.  We need to come to an agreement quickly before the money loses more value!
